name: generate-response
description: Generate a response using the LLM based on the prompt, history, user intent, profile summary, and upgrade recommendation.

isConcise.description: Whether to limit the response to 60 words

basePrompt.description: The base system prompt to include

history.description: The chat history including the user's latest message

interpretedMessage.description: Summary of user intent, sentiment, and topic

profileSummary.description: Verbal summary of the customer profile

upgradeSuggestion.description: Specific product or plan upgrade recommendation

llmReply.description: The generated response from the LLM
